name: Rocco the Osciloscope
description: Rocco the Osciloscope is a member of the WebtrES club. With his sleek and stylish design, he captures the essence of the oscilloscope theme. His body is adorned with a rossoCorsa colored box, resembling the vibrant red shade often associated with high-performance sports cars. Rocco's buttons and arms and legs are cleverly designed to resemble a cat's, giving him a playful and agile appearance. The classic screen in the center of his body displays intricate waveforms, showcasing his advanced analytical capabilities. To complete his fashionable look, Rocco is equipped with a pair of sleek shades, adding a touch of sophistication to his overall aesthetic.
